question: The clinical trial period ends in Month 12. Which of the following is true?

options.A: Treatment A will be approved for use.
options.B: Treatment C will be approved for use.
options.C: Treatment B will be approved for use.

explanation: While Treatment A currently has the highest effectiveness (75.2%), the chart shows results as of Month 3, but the trial period ends in Month 12. The remaining trial period could significantly change the results, making it premature to approve any treatment. The concealed uncertainty lies in the incomplete trial process that is not reflected in the chart.
